identified-content.org: Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Co of America

abstract.p: UBS Warburg's Neil Currie downgrades Great Atlantic and Pacific Tea Co from hold to sell (S)

block.p: Wall Street analysts seem to use the word ''sell'' less often than devout grandmothers use profanity. But it happened last week. Neil Currie of UBS Warburg downgraded the Great Atlantic and Pacific Tea Company to ''sell'' from ''hold.'' His was the only ''sell'' rating among 103 rating changes or new ratings reported by Bloomberg News on Thursday. A.& P.'s stock, which closed at $12.06, has fallen 64.9 percent this year.

His was the only ''sell'' rating among 103 rating changes or new ratings reported by Bloomberg News on Thursday. A.& P.'s stock, which closed at $12.06, has fallen 64.9 percent this year.
